mean_cn: n. 被任命者，被提名的人，代名人
mean_en: someone or something that has been chosen as a candidate for a job, position, office, honor, award, etc. :someone or something that has been nominated
word_etyma: nomin名称，名字+ee被…的人 → 被任命者
sentence: He's very confident that he will be one of the nominees for the election.
sentence_trans: 他很自信会在大选里成为一名候选人。
